name: Tomb Robber (Jake Bretherton)
description:
An intrepid explorer seeks the treasures of an ancient tomb but quickly realises their mistake as a mysterious event causes them to lose control.

Submission for 2020 Global Game Jam - "Repair"

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/tomb-robber-3

Original Soundtrack by Calum Sarjeant
